alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 26 at 3:45AM MST until December 27 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Fire Weather Watch is in effect for portions of the area for Tuesday afternoon... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228, 229, 230, AND 233... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 228, 229, 230 and 233. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...10 to 15 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start may spread rapidly due to gusty winds.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
